markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Lastwall Survivor](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=68)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 46 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Eye of Dread

</column>

You managed to escape the devastation that the Whispering Tyrant brought to your nation, but you lost everything to the lich-king’s minions, including your home and many friends and family.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) skill, and the [Undead Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Battle Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=760) skill feat.
name: Lastwall Survivor

text: Lastwall Survivor Source World Guide pg. 46 2.0 Region Eye of Dread You managed to escape the devastation that the Whispering Tyrant brought to your nation, but you lost everything to the lich-king’s minions, including your home and many friends and family. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Medicine skill, and the Undead Lore skill. You gain the Battle Medicine skill feat.
